testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Attempt uninstalling a local development version that is not installed ?[90m# local_developement_versions.feature:30?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mthe candidate "?[0m?[32m?[1mgroovy?[0m?[32m" version "?[0m?[32m?[1m2.1-SNAPSHOT?[0m?[32m" is not installed?[0m ?[90m# installation_steps.groovy:16?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe system is bootstrapped?[0m ?[90m# initialisation_steps.groovy:115?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1msdk uninstall groovy 2.1-SNAPSHOT?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:5?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mgroovy 2.1-SNAPSHOT is not installed.?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m
